title: Beach Villa
details:
This beautiful villa is located on the quiet coast of Seththapaduwa, Deewara Mawatha 147A, Pamunugamaroad, in the Western Province of Sri Lanka. It is only a short distance away from Bandaranaike Airport and Negombo. The recently opened Katunayke highway allows Colombo to be reached with a 20 minute drive.

An ideal location on the coast, and the proximity to the Negombo Lagoon (only 800 metres to the back of the house) provides you with the tropical feel you would expect and desire from Sri Lanka, but also a cool refreshing sea breeze.

The villa, designed by a renowned architect, has a contemporary style with beautiful colonials details and provides you with all the modern luxuries a European family requires.
